vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
ACCURAL_DEPOSIT.initialized (patch_13.sol#10) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- setMinSum (patch_13.sol#16-19)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_13.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_13.sol#1): it allows old versions
